attributes.action: All full-time students to receive free parking spaces
attributes.background: It costs approximately £15 to pay to park for college/university weekly, on top of usual car fees such as insurance which is around £2500 a year and on a national minimum wage of £7.20 for under 25's, its hard to afford.

rejection.details: Car parking is the responsibility of individual colleges and universities or, in some cases, the relevant local authority. We could accept a petition asking for the Government to fund free parking for students at colleges and universities.
